Subject: Issue with Security Update – EPP Server Hotfix #1.1 (HWA-EPP4-U8800) Due to Insufficient Disk Space
Description:
Dear Support Team,

I am experiencing an error while attempting to apply the Security Update – EPP Server Hotfix #1.1. Although the update process completes with the status "Patch applied successfully," the patch is not actually applied and remains available in the Endpoint Protector Server menu under Live Update - Available EPP Software Updates.

I suspect that the issue is due to insufficient disk space, as there is only 8.65 GB free out of 49.04 GB (18%).

Here is the current disk space usage:

Disk Space System: 38G used - 82% from 50G
Disk Space EPP Server: 582G used - 32% from 2.0T

We have a 2TB storage attached to the VM, and we would like to map this storage for other components/system logs to free up and increase the capacity of the 50GB system partition.

I would appreciate your assistance in freeing up space on the system to facilitate the application of this security update and any other necessary updates.

Thank you.
